nodes.text: Finwej was a male slicer. Sometime between 32 ABY and 34 ABY, the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca acquired First Order codes from Finwej in order to steal a data archive from the trader Mek Nu'Tiv, as he was the only slicer they could afford to pay. The smugglers met with Nu'Tiv, disguised as officers of the First Order, and the trader recognized Finwej's codes. Nu'Tiv, who believed that Finwej was an inadequate slicer and doubted that the First Order would work with him, denounced Solo as a fraud.
Finwej was first mentioned in Poe Dameron Annual 2, a comic written by Jody Houser and published by Marvel Comics on August 29, 2018.
